synopsis.text: Loves ick Prince and the Unlikely Love Interest: In a world plucked straight from the pages of a romance novel, Loneal Gravis finds himself reincarnated as a side character, determined to avoid meddling with the main love story between the charming Prince Alec and the beautiful heroine, Lily. However, Loneal's plans to stay under the radar are foiled when the prince sets his sights on him instead of the heroine. As the prince's infatuation grows, Loneal finds himself in the unexpected position of being the object of the prince's affections. With the storyline deviating from the original novel, Loneal must navigate his newfound relationship with the prince while trying to make sense of this new twist in the tale. Will Loneal be able to resist the prince's charms, or will he succumb to the allure of this unexpected love story?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
